required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Vegan Diet, Amla Fruits and Uric Acid
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of a Healthy Vegan Diet vs. Low Purine Diet, With or Without Amla Fruits (Emblica Officinalis) on Hyperuricemia and Other Cardiometabolic Risk Factors: a Randomized Two-by-two Factorial Trial

brief_summary.textblock: This is an intervention study aiming to test the effectiveness of a vegan diet, My Plate with low purine choices, and amla fruits on uric acid and other cardiometabolic risk factors in individuals with high serum uric acid levels.

detailed_description.textblock: Ninety-two participants with hyperuricemia will be randomly assigned to one of these 4 diet interventions: (1) vegan, (2) vegan with amla fruits, (3) my plate-low purine, (4) my plate-low purine with amla fruits. During the 3 months intervention phase, participants will attend group lessons and individual nutrition counseling sessions to assist adherence to the diet. At baseline, end of 3 months, and 1 year, participants will be measured on uric acid and other cardiometabolic risk factors, and some nutritional markers. Amla fruits powder, and some foods encouraged in each dietary arm will be provided to enhance adherence during the 3 months intervention phase.

secondary_outcome.description: body mass index calculated from height and weight

arm_group.arm_group_label: Healthy Vegan Diet with Amla fruits
arm_group.description: Education on healthy vegan diet, 3g of powdered amla fruits per day
Education on "My Plate" diet with emphasis on choosing low purine protein options.

arm_group.arm_group_label: My Plate - Low Purine with Amla Fruits.
arm_group.description: Education on "My Plate" diet with emphasis on choosing low purine protein options and with an addition of 3g of amla powder per day.

intervention.description: Participants will attend group lessons and individual nutrition counseling to help them adopt a healthy vegan diet.
intervention.arm_group_label: Healthy Vegan Diet with Amla fruits

intervention.description: Participants will attend group lessons and individual nutrition counseling to help them adopt a balanced diet in accordance with my plate, and emphasis on choosing low purine options from the protein food groups.
intervention.arm_group_label: My Plate - Low Purine with Amla Fruits.

intervention.description: Participants will be provided with powdered amla fruits, and will be instructed to take 3g per day.
intervention.arm_group_label: Healthy Vegan Diet with Amla fruits
My Plate - Low Purine with Amla Fruits.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Men with serum uric acid > 7mg/dL
- Women with serum uric acid > 6mg/dL
- Willing to make diet changes according to dietary interventions
Exclusion Criteria:
- Age <19
- With cancer diagnosis
- With diseases that require special dietary needs
- On urate-lowering medication within 3 months

overall_official.affiliation: Fu-Jen Catholic University, Department of Nutritional Science

facility.name: Department of Nutritional Science, Fu-Jen Catholic University

patient_data.ipd_description: IPD may be shared after the results have been published in peer review journals.
